org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.attributes

Class LengthAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.attributes.BaseAttribute
      • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.attributes.DoubleAttribute
        • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.attributes.LengthAttribute

  • public class LengthAttribute
extends DoubleAttribute
    Attribute to hold a length. The length is always considered a distance in millimeters. This inherits it's functionality from the double attribute, but locks the suffix. The class is also used for identification.

      • setSuffix

        public void setSuffix(java.lang.String suffix)
        Intercept any suffix changes and ignore them. This value is always considered to be millimeters.
        Overrides:
        setSuffix in class BaseAttribute
        Parameters:
        suffix - The suffix of the length (ignored).
